bug_112Cart.description: After adding any goods into the cart, cart doesn't open
bug_112Cart.expected_result: Cart open by clicking on it
bug_112Cart.actual_result: There is no changes on the page after clicking on the cart, this one doesn't open
bug_112Cart.steps_to_reproduce: 1.Open shop2313142525.com 2.Add any goods into the cart 3.Click on the cart
